name: Harold's Harrowing Heroics
description:
Unfortunately, we were so tired when uploading the game that we uploaded the wrong build! We are very sorry for the confusion. The current build on this site has a slim chance of crashing between the tutorial and the first level. It does not crash every time! Again, we are very sorry and will upload the correct build after the jam voting period ends to stay fair to the other competitors. The game plays best through the Oculus Quest 1/2 and Steam/Windows Mixed Reality software.

Introduction

In this quick-thinking action VR game, you'll find yourself trapped in a perilous and magical castle, surrounded by hordes of goo-like slime monsters! Be wary, for the ever-expanding slimes have taken over and you may quickly run out of space!

Not to fear, though, for your wizard guide has taken steps enable your escape. Hidden within the mazes and dungeons of this castle are magical crystals, imbued with the power of mystical runes. Each one will enhance your stamina, speed, or weapon! Unfortunately, with each slime monster your slay, your available inventory slots will also become gunked up with goo. 

You must brave this castle and find your way out before you run out of space in your inventory and become the latest victim of the slimes!

How To Play

Strap on your favorite VR hardware and take a quick journey into a dangerous world of slime and quickly waning options:

  • Use the grip button to pick up items with either your left or right hand to hold items
  • Pick up gems and put them into your right gauntlet to increase different attributes (Speed, Weapon Length, Health)
  • Hold a sword and swing it at the slimes to chop them down to size!
  • Beware, slimes when split will continue to grow
  • Use the left thumbstick to move, and the right thumbstick to turn
  • In the main menu, interact with the bricks to determine your settings
    • Snap-Turn or Free-Turn
    • Head-Based Locomotion or
    • Music / SFX settings
    • Specify snap-turn angle or free turn speed

For best experience please ensure both your headset and two controllers are powered on prior to playing the game and that the game window on your desktop machine is select (active) so that sound can be heard.

Installation
  1. Download Plus2Studios_HaroldsHarrowingHeroics.zip
  2. Save it to your desktop
  3. Right Click > Extract Here
  4. Open folder and double click on the .EXE file
List any content that was created before the Jam:
  • Fonts: GoudyMedieval (Demi-Bold, Regular)
  • Music: Army of Death, Medieval Theme #2, Steel Enemy, Mystical Loop #1

All other assets were created with in a 1 week timespan for the Epic MegaJam (2021)
